docs.lead_paragraph: When I walked into the Strand Bookstore in Manhattan last week, I headed straight for the bright young thing who wore an "Ask Me" button, and asked her to point me to the section of the store where I might find Sarah Palin's memoir, "Going Rogue: An American Life." She looked at me as if I had requested a copy of "Mein Kampf" signed in blood by the author, and directed me to the nearest Barnes and Noble, where, presumably, readers of dubious taste and sensibility could find what they wanted.

headline.main: Sarah Palin Is Coming to Town

docs.abstract: The real surprise about Sarah Palin's autobiography.
docs.snippet: The real surprise about Sarah Palin's autobiography.

docs.lead_paragraph: 7 P.M. (Planet Green) BURN UP (2008) Rupert Penry-Jones plays Tom, a burgeoning oilman, and Bradley Whitford, above, is Mack, the top oil lobbyist in Washington and Tom's best friend, in this British thriller having its American premiere. When Holly (Neve Campbell), an environmental activist, infiltrates Tom's company, she makes him aware of a world on the brink of destruction -- one in which those fighting climate change and those aiming to get rich, no matter the cost to the planet, are willing to lay their lives on the line. Now it's up to the three of them to decide where their loyalties lie. This encore presentation of Part 1 is followed, at 9, by the premiere of Part 2. Omar Madha directed, and Simon Beaufoy, who won an Oscar for his script for ''Slumdog Millionaire,'' wrote the screenplay. 9 A.M. (ABC) LIVE WITH REGIS AND KELLY ''Inside the Chef's Kitchen: Holiday Edition,'' a weeklong series of cooking segments, begins with a visit with Lidia Bastianich at her Chelsea restaurant, Del Posto. She'll share her recipe for pasta with calamari, scallops and shrimp.

docs.lead_paragraph: My Sunday column argues that as long as we're trying to renovate the health care system, we should work on public health as well as clinical efforts. I give the example of lead reduction in my column; I didn't have space to say that by one estimate, the elimination of lead from gas has brought us $200 billion in annual economic savings and benefits. Another great public health effort was the campaign against smoking, backed by the cigarette tax. A third was the broad effort to improve auto safety, including seatbelts and airbags.
docs.abstract: As long as we're reforming health care, we should also boost regulations over the chemicals around us. These chemicals, such as endocrine disruptors, are suspected of playing a role in breast cancer and other ailments.
docs.snippet: As long as we're reforming health care, we should also boost regulations over the chemicals around us. These chemicals, such as endocrine disruptors, are suspected of playing a role in breast cancer and other ailments.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the course of praising a Baltimore ordinance requiring crisis pregnancy centers to advertise the fact that they don't perform abortions, Emily Bazelon dismisses the suggestion, raised by an opponent of the bill, that Planned Parenthood should have to post signs as well:
docs.abstract: Comparing crisis pregnancy centers and Planned Parenthood.
docs.snippet: Comparing crisis pregnancy centers and Planned Parenthood.

docs.lead_paragraph: 10 P.M. (CBS) THE VICTORIA'S SECRET FASHION SHOW Alessandra Ambrosio, Miranda Kerr, Doutzen Kroes, Marisa Miller and the winner of a model search voted on by the public will sashay down the runway in an assortment of holiday skivvies -- like the $3 million Harlequin Fantasy bra designed by the Italian jeweler Damiani -- to the strains of the Black Eyed Peas. The host is Heidi Klum, right, who made a surprise walk down the runway at this show taped late last month, just six weeks after giving birth to her fourth child. 8 P.M. (ABC, CBS, CNBC, CNN, Fox, Fox Business Network, Fox News Channel, MSNBC, NBC, NY1, 13)PRESIDENTIAL ADDRESSPresident Obama, speaking from the United States Military Academy at West Point, outlines his strategy to ''finish the job'' in Afghanistan, which may include the addition of troops and an exit plan.
